location.zh-cn: 山东省肥城市陆房地区

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，八路军第115师在山东省肥城县陆房地区与日伪军发生的一场突围战斗。
description.en: A breakout battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War between the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army and Japanese and puppet troops in the Lufang area of Feicheng County, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。
description.en: A full-scale war fought between China and the Empire of Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 时任八路军115师代师长，陆房战斗中中国军队的指挥官之一。
description.en: Acting Commander of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army at the time, and one of the commanders of the Chinese forces in the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 时任八路军115师政委，在陆房战斗期间，虽不在包围圈内，但通过电报建议了突围方向。
description.en: Political Commissar of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army at the time. Although not inside the encirclement during the Lufang Battle, he suggested the breakout direction via telegram.

description.zh-cn: 时任日本侵华军第十二军司令官，策划并指挥了对泰西山区的扫荡围攻，引发陆房战斗。
description.en: Commander of the 12th Army of the Japanese invasion forces in China at the time, who planned and commanded the mopping-up and encirclement campaign against the Taixi mountainous area, leading to the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1947年间的国家军队。
description.en: The national army of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的、编入国民革命军序列的正规军队。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, a regular army led by the Communist Party of China, incorporated into the National Revolutionary Army.

en: 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 八路军的主力师之一，陆房战斗中被日军包围的主力部队。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army, and the main force surrounded by the Japanese army in the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 指在第二次中日战争期间侵略中国的日本军队。
description.en: Refers to the Japanese military forces that invaded China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 驻山东的日本侵华军部队，陆房战斗中日军的主力。
description.en: The Japanese invasion forces stationed in Shandong, and the main Japanese force in the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 指在中国抗日战争期间，由投靠日本的中国人组成的、协助日军作战的军事及准军事组织。
description.en: Refers to military and paramilitary organizations composed of Chinese collaborators who assisted the Japanese army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 时任115师司令部参谋处长，在陈光师长下到一线指挥时，临时负起战役全盘指挥之责。
description.en: Chief of Staff of the 115th Division Headquarters at the time. When Commander Chen Guang went to the front line, he temporarily assumed overall command of the battle.

en: 686th Regiment, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 115师下属团，在陆房战斗中承担了抢占阵地、激烈战斗及掩护师部突围等重要任务。
description.en: A regiment under the 115th Division, which undertook important tasks in the Lufang Battle such as seizing positions, fighting fiercely, and covering the breakout of the division headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 时任686团团长，在陆房战斗中亲自到一线指挥作战。
description.en: Commander of the 686th Regiment at the time, who personally commanded operations on the front line during the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 时任686团政委，在陆房战斗中负责指挥所并参与制定突围计划。
description.en: Political Commissar of the 686th Regiment at the time, who was in charge of the command post and participated in planning the breakout during the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 参与陆房战斗的八路军部队之一。
description.en: One of the Eighth Route Army units that participated in the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 参与陆房战斗的八路军部队之一。
description.en: One of the Eighth Route Army units that participated in the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，陆房战斗的发生地。
description.en: A province of China, the location of the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 山东省泰安市下辖的县级市，陆房战斗的具体发生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Tai'an, Shandong, and the specific location of the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 时任一一五师政治部保卫部代理部长，带领一部分部队突围。
description.en: Acting Director of the Security Department of the 115th Division's Political Department, who led a portion of the troops in the breakout.

description.zh-cn: 时任一一五师政治部民运部部长，带领师部直属队和六八六团一部分突围。
description.en: Director of the Mass Movement Department of the 115th Division's Political Department, who led the division's direct subordinates and a part of the 686th Regiment in the breakout.

nodes.id: 一一五师政治部保卫部

zh-cn: 一一五师政治部保卫部

description.zh-cn: 八路军第115师政治部下属部门。
description.en: A department under the Political Department of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

nodes.id: 一一五师政治部民运部

zh-cn: 一一五师政治部民运部

description.zh-cn: 八路军第115师政治部下属部门。
description.en: A department under the Political Department of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东地区的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in the Shandong region.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念陆房战斗而设立的遗址。
description.en: A memorial site established to commemorate the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 陆房战斗是中国抗日战争中的一场战斗。
description.en: The Lufang Battle was a battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 尾高龟藏作为日军第12军司令官，纠集部队对泰西山区进行扫荡围攻，直接引发了陆房战斗。
description.en: As the commander of the Japanese 12th Army, Odaka Kamekichi gathered troops to conduct a mopping-up and encirclement campaign against the Taixi mountainous area, directly triggering the Lufang Battle.

description.zh-cn: 在陆房战斗中，日军第12军对八路军第115师及其他部队形成了合围。
description.en: During the Lufang Battle, the Japanese 12th Army encircled the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army and other units.

description.zh-cn: 在陆房战斗中，伪军协助日军第12军对八路军第115师及其他部队形成了合围。
description.en: During the Lufang Battle, puppet troops assisted the Japanese 12th Army in encircling the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army and other units.

description.zh-cn: 在陆房战斗中，八路军第115师与日军第12军是敌对的作战方。
description.en: In the Lufang Battle, the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army and the Japanese 12th Army were opposing combatants.

description.zh-cn: 陈光在1939年陆房战斗期间担任八路军115师代师长。
description.en: Chen Guang served as the Acting Commander of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 罗荣桓在1939年陆房战斗期间担任八路军115师政委。
description.en: Luo Ronghuan served as the Political Commissar of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 尾高龟藏在1939年陆房战斗期间担任日军第12军司令官。
description.en: Odaka Kamekichi served as the Commander of the Japanese 12th Army during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

position.en: Chief of Staff of the Division Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 王秉璋在1939年陆房战斗期间担任115师司令部参谋处长。
description.en: Wang Bingzhang served as the Chief of Staff of the 115th Division Headquarters during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 张仁初在1939年陆房战斗期间担任686团团长。
description.en: Zhang Renchu served as the Commander of the 686th Regiment during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 刘西元在1939年陆房战斗期间担任686团政委。
description.en: Liu Xiyuan served as the Political Commissar of the 686th Regiment during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

relationships.type: 一一五师政治部保卫部

description.zh-cn: 何运洪在1939年陆房战斗期间担任一一五师政治部保卫部代理部长。
description.en: He Yunhong served as the Acting Director of the Security Department of the 115th Division's Political Department during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

relationships.type: 一一五师政治部民运部

description.zh-cn: 潘振武在1939年陆房战斗期间担任一一五师政治部民运部部长。
description.en: Pan Zhenwu served as the Director of the Mass Movement Department of the 115th Division's Political Department during the Lufang Battle in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，八路军被改编并纳入国民革命军序列。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Eighth Route Army was reorganized and incorporated into the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 115师是八路军下属的主力师之一。
description.en: The 115th Division was one of the main divisions subordinate to the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 686团是115师下属的团级单位。
description.en: The 686th Regiment was a regimental unit subordinate to the 115th Division.

description.zh-cn: 第12军是日本侵华军的一部分。
description.en: The 12th Army was part of the Japanese invasion forces in China.

description.zh-cn: 伪军是协助日本侵华军作战的中国部队。
description.en: The puppet army was a Chinese force that assisted the Japanese invasion forces in China.

description.zh-cn: 罗荣桓政委在包围圈外通过电报向师部建议了突围方向，对部队成功突围起到了关键推动作用。
description.en: From outside the encirclement, Political Commissar Luo Ronghuan suggested a breakout direction to the division headquarters via telegram, playing a key role in the successful breakout of the troops.

description.zh-cn: 在师长陈光下到一线后，王秉璋临时负起战役全盘指挥之责，推动了战斗的进行。
description.en: After Commander Chen Guang went to the front line, Wang Bingzhang temporarily assumed overall command of the battle, pushing the combat forward.

description.zh-cn: 1939年3月下旬，罗荣桓去津浦路东沂蒙山区，向山东分局传达党的六届六中全会精神。
description.en: In late March 1939, Luo Ronghuan went to the Yimeng mountainous area east of the Jin-Pu railway to convey the spirit of the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th Central Committee of the Party to the Shandong Sub-bureau.

description.zh-cn: 陆房战斗是设立陆房战斗遗址的原因。
description.en: The Lufang Battle is the reason for the establishment of the Lufang Battle Memorial Site.
